original_text: The Lord has done to you as he spoke by me, for the Lord has torn the kingdom out of your hand and given it to your neighbor, David.
korean_text: 여호와께서 나를 통하여 말씀하신 대로 네게 행하사 나라를 네 손에서 떼어 네 이웃 다윗에게 주셨느니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has done to you
for the Lord has torn the kingdom out of your hand
and given it to your neighbor, David.
